ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var l=eval(java.importScript(lycurl)+'')[0];
for (let char in l.ruleBookInfo) {	source.ruleBookInfo[char]=l.ruleBookInfo[char];}
for (let char in l.ruleToc) {
source.ruleToc[char]=l.ruleToc[char];}
eval(l.ruleBookInfo.init.replace('@js:',''));
result
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let r=cache.getFromMemory('xhycy');
if (!r)
r=eval(java.readTxtFile(java.md5Encode16(lycurl)+'.json')+'')[0];
var l=r.ruleContent;
for (let char in l) {
source.ruleContent[char]=l[char];}
gets(l.content);
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var l=eval(java.importScript(lycurl)+'')[0].ruleExplore;
for (let char in l) {
source.ruleExplore[char]=l[char];}
java.getElement(l.bookList);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
var l=eval(java.importScript(lycurl)+'')[0];
for (let char in l.ruleSearch) {
source.ruleSearch[char]=l.ruleSearch[char];}
l.searchUrl;
</js>
